outline.title: Articulate AI
outline.summary: Cover slide introducing Articulate AI as the gold standard in AI-powered communication with the tagline 'Every word, perfected.'
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/cGPi8QogYNQu.png - The cover slide needs a strong visual representing AI and communication. Image 3 is a clean, professional isometric illustration showing a bot interacting with business people over a large smartphone, which fits the theme "AI-Powered Communication."

outline.title: The Problem
outline.summary: Businesses lose millions in missed opportunities due to communication gaps. Traditional call centers cost $3-5 per call with limited scalability, human agents are constrained by time zones and capacity, and customer expectations for immediate responses continue to rise.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/EsYBJivR80P9.jpg - Image showing the contrast between human agent challenges and AI solutions, representing the communication problem.

outline.title: The Impact
outline.summary: Key statistics demonstrating the scale of the problem: 75% of customers expect immediate responses, 67% of businesses struggle with service quality consistency, and 20-30% of potential revenue is lost due to missed or poorly handled calls.

outline.title: Market Opportunity
outline.summary: The AI agents market presents a massive opportunity, growing from $7.84B in 2025 to $52.62B by 2030 at 46.3% CAGR. The growth chart visualizes this explosive expansion trajectory.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/FJ5jDkomeHpK.jpg - Year-over-year growth chart visualizing market expansion trajectory

outline.title: Market Drivers
outline.summary: Key market drivers fueling growth: 97% of enterprises exploring voice AI adoption, advances in LLM capabilities enabling human-like conversations, demand for 24/7 customer service without proportional cost increases, and proven ROI with 60-80% cost reduction versus traditional call centers.

outline.title: The Solution
outline.summary: Articulate AI delivers enterprise-grade voice agents that communicate with unparalleled clarity and professionalism through a no-code platform with seamless integrations and real-time intelligence.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/sBKa2RsHgxIl.png - This slide introduces the solution: an enterprise-grade voice agent. Image 2 is a direct illustration of an "AI Voice Agent" with a human-like hologram and a phone, perfectly matching the core product.

outline.title: Competitive Advantage
outline.summary: Three core competitive advantages create defensible moats: premium brand positioning targeting quality-focused businesses, superior technology stack with sub-800ms latency using best-in-class providers, and LLM-agnostic modular architecture enabling rapid adoption of new AI capabilities without vendor lock-in.

outline.title: Market Differentiation
outline.summary: Comparison table showing how Articulate AI differentiates across key dimensions: SMB to Enterprise target market, best-in-class voice quality (MOS 4.5+), sub-800ms latency, excellent no-code ease of use, and tiered plus usage pricing model, compared to competitors who focus on developers or enterprise only with varying quality and complexity levels.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/17ERn5mW8VI0.jpg - Image showing professionals in a meeting with a communication book cover, representing strategic positioning and business communication focus.

outline.title: Business Model
outline.summary: Hybrid SaaS model with tiered subscriptions: Starter ($99/mo, 200 min), Professional ($299/mo, 750 min), Business ($799/mo, 2,500 min), and Enterprise (custom pricing). Usage-based overage charges range from $0.30-0.50 per minute.

outline.title: Unit Economics
outline.summary: Strong unit economics with 56-78% gross margins, 12:1 LTV:CAC ratio, $0.22 cost per 5-minute call, and $6,000 customer lifetime value. Multiple revenue streams including subscriptions, usage fees, integration fees, and professional services.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/55JPWqwMXV23.webp - Financial metrics dashboard visualization showing the unit economics and revenue structure.

outline.title: Go-to-Market Strategy
outline.summary: Multi-channel acquisition through digital marketing, strategic partnerships, and direct sales targets high-value customers with proven conversion paths and 120% net revenue retention.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/bb0x8JMen8ar.png - This slide covers the Go-to-Market Strategy, which involves sales, partnerships, and direct outreach. Image 6 shows a professional business meeting and discussion, representing the execution of the GTM strategy and direct sales efforts.

outline.title: Financial Projections
outline.summary: Path to $90M ARR by Year 5 with 40% EBITDA margin. Achieving profitability in Month 24 with strong unit economics and scalable infrastructure.

outline.title: Funding Requirements
outline.summary: Seeking $2.5M seed round for 18-month runway to profitability. Prominently display the funding ask, runway timeline, and key milestones to be achieved: launch MVP and onboard first 100 customers, achieve $1M ARR by Month 12, build sales team and establish partner ecosystem, reach profitability and prepare for Series A.

outline.title: Use of Funds
outline.summary: Detailed breakdown of capital deployment across four key areas: Product Development (40%, $1.0M) for engineering team and platform development, Sales & Marketing (35%, $875K) for team hiring and campaigns, Customer Success (15%, $375K) for support and onboarding, and Operations & Infrastructure (10%, $250K) for cloud infrastructure and overhead.

outline.title: The Team
outline.summary: Introduce the founding team with three co-founders: CEO & Co-Founder with 15+ years in AI product development and SaaS leadership, previously led product teams at enterprise AI companies scaling from seed to Series C with deep expertise in conversational AI and NLP; CTO & Co-Founder with PhD in Machine Learning and 12+ years building production AI systems, former engineering leader at voice technology companies, expert in real-time speech processing, LLM integration, and scalable cloud architectures; COO & Co-Founder with 20+ years in enterprise SaaS sales and operations, built and scaled sales teams from 0 to $50M ARR at multiple B2B SaaS companies with expertise in go-to-market strategy, channel partnerships, and customer success. Include the business communication book cover image showing diverse people to represent the human expertise and communication focus.
outline.image_plan: /home/ubuntu/upload/search_images/J3dhPgQu8tBe.jpg - This slide introduces the founding team and their expertise. Image shows a book cover titled 'Business and Professional Communication: A Human-Centered Approach' with diverse people, subtly representing the human expertise behind the product and the focus on communication.

outline.title: Advisory Board
outline.summary: Present the advisory board with four key advisors: AI Research Advisor specializing in Conversational AI, former Director at leading AI research lab with 50+ publications in NLP; Enterprise Sales Advisor specializing in B2B SaaS GTM, built sales org at unicorn SaaS company with $200M+ in enterprise revenue; Voice Tech Advisor specializing in Speech Technology, pioneer in voice AI who founded and exited voice tech startup to Fortune 500; Contact Center Advisor specializing in CX Operations, former VP Operations at global contact center provider managing 10K+ agents. Include a team philosophy section emphasizing the combination of deep technical expertise with real-world business experience, highlighting that the team has built AI systems at scale, sold to enterprises, and understands operational challenges customers face.

outline.title: Traction & Validation
outline.summary: Early customer validation with 50+ businesses on waitlist, 10 design partner agreements, and positive pilot feedback demonstrating product-market fit.

outline.title: Vision & Roadmap
outline.summary: Building the global standard for AI-powered business communication, expanding from voice to multi-modal communication and industry-specific solutions over the next five years.

outline.title: Join Us
outline.summary: Investment opportunity to join at the ground floor of a category-defining company in a market growing at 46% annually. Closing $2.5M seed round in Q1 2026.
